claims.claim: AI-powered recommendations increase engagement and average order value
claims.quote: ASOS uses collaborative filtering and machine learning for smart recommendations, to suggest products based on browsing patterns and what similar customers buy together, increasing engagement and average order value.

claims.claim: AI Fit Assistant reduces returns and improves customer satisfaction
claims.quote: The ASOS Fit Assistant tool uses machine learning to analyze past purchases, returns, and customer measurements to provide accurate size recommendations, reducing returns and improving customer satisfaction.

claims.claim: AI personalization strategies increase average order value and reduce sizing-related returns
claims.quote: ASOS AI personalization strategies help increase average order value (AOV), reduce sizing-related returns and exchanges.

claims.claim: AI improves conversion rates through personalized discovery and styling
claims.quote: ASOS uses machine learning for product clusters, visual search, virtual try-on, and Azure OpenAI to deliver personalized discovery and styling - improving conversion and average order value.

claims.claim: AI implementation enhances customer experience, increases conversions, and customer satisfaction
claims.quote: ASOS implements artificial intelligence (AI), machine learning (ML), predictive analytics, and automation, among other AI-based capabilities to enhance customer experience, increase conversions, and customer satisfaction.
